entities.name: Meta (Facebook, Instagram, Threads)
entities.description: Major social media platform active across all markets. 91.8% compliance with Turkish government requests (2024).
entities.notes: Under pressure from Turkish state censorship. Competition authority investigation (March 2024).

entities.name: TikTok
entities.description: 91.8% compliance rate with Turkish government removal requests (2024).

entities.name: TRNC Presidency Social Media
entities.description: English-language social media service. Facebook, X, Instagram presence. Active UK media engagement.

entities.name: Freely (Everyone TV)
entities.description: BBC, ITV, Channel 4, Channel 5 collaboration. 20 million users, 100 million devices, 170 channels.
entities.notes: Fastest-growing TV platform (2025). Partnerships: Warner Bros. Discovery, CNN.

entities.name: Olay Gazetesi
entities.description: Turkish newspaper based in London. Covers UK news, economics, culture, Cyprus topics.
entities.notes: Serves Turkish Cypriot community in UK.

entities.name: TRNC Public Information Office
entities.description: Official media liaison. Global media monitoring. Daily bulletins on Cyprus issues.
entities.notes: One of TRNC's oldest institutions. Multi-platform presence.

entities.name: Turkish Football Federation (TFF)
entities.description: UEFA member. Riva 'Hasan Doğan' national teams training centre (Istanbul).

entities.name: Cyprus Football Association (CFA)
entities.description: Republic of Cyprus football governance. Based in Nicosia. UEFA member.

entities.name: Cyprus Turkish Football Association (KTFF)
entities.description: Northern Cyprus football governance. Established 1955. CONIFA member (since 2013).

entities.name: British Council - Creative Collaborations
entities.description: 34 Turkish organizations, 27 UK partners, 37 projects, 20 cities, 65,000+ people reached (2022-2025).
entities.notes: Funding up to £17,500 per project. Disciplines: Visual arts, film, music, theatre, dance.

entities.name: British Council Music
entities.description: All music genres. UK artists connected with international partners. Professional exchange programs.

entities.name: Selector Pro Conference
entities.description: Held in Istanbul (2017). Turkish and UK music specialists. Digital music trends discussions.
entities.notes: Speakers: Mixcloud, music industry professionals. Panel: 'Musicians as Labels'.

entities.name: UK-Cyprus Memorandum of Understanding
entities.description: Second annual review (December 2024). Foreign policy cooperation. Ukraine support. Illicit finance.
entities.notes: Maritime humanitarian initiatives (Cyprus Amalthea Initiative to Gaza).

entities.name: UK-Turkey Free Trade Agreement
entities.description: Preferential tariffs, rules of origin, intellectual property, government procurement.

entities.name: Cyprus Seeds + Conception X
entities.description: Partnership for deep-tech entrepreneurship. Conception X: Leading PhD deep-tech venture programme.
entities.notes: Cypriot university/research center teams. Specialized training and mentorship.

entities.name: Invest Cyprus
entities.description: European tech investment hub. UK listed among target investment countries.
entities.notes: EU membership, competitive tax, startup visas, digital nomad initiatives.

entities.name: Enterprise Europe Network (Cyprus)
entities.description: International business-technology-R&D partnerships. Europe's largest online database.

entities.name: Council of Turkish Cypriot Associations (CTCA) UK
entities.description: Established 1983. Britain's largest Turkish Cypriot umbrella organization. 300,000-strong community. 20 member associations.
entities.notes: Annual Turkish Cypriot Festival. Community advocacy.

entities.name: Turkish Cypriot Community Association (TCCA)
entities.description: Operating since 1976. Multi-award-winning charity. Services: Turkish Cypriot, Turkish, Greek Cypriot, Kurdish speakers.
entities.notes: Homecare, training, community facilities. Turkish Cypriot Arts and Cultural Festival.

entities.name: National Federation of Cypriots in the UK
entities.description: Representative body for Cypriots (including Turkish Cypriots). All-Party Parliamentary Group for Cyprus.
entities.notes: Economic Diplomacy Roundtable. UK Cypriot Professionals Network.

entities.name: Human Rights Watch
entities.description: Joint open letter to social media companies (May 2025). Social media censorship advocacy.
entities.notes: Freedom of expression protection. Article 19 partnership.
